trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting"></xref> event of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Udostępnia dane dla <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting"> </xref> zdarzenie <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource"> </xref> formantu.

trans-unit.source: By adding an event handler delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting> event, you can perform any additional preprocessing required or cancel the database query entirely.
trans-unit.target: Dodając obiektu delegowanego obsługi zdarzeń do obsługi <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting>zdarzeń, możesz wykonać wszelkie dodatkowe przetwarzanie wstępne wymagane lub całkowicie anulować wykonywanie zapytania bazy danych.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: Because the SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs class is derived from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs> class, you can cancel a pending <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> database query by setting the <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> property to `true`.
trans-unit.target: Ponieważ jest pochodną klasy SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>klasy, możesz anulować oczekujące <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>zapytanie bazy danych przez ustawienie <xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A>właściwości `true`.</xref:System.ComponentModel.CancelEventArgs.Cancel%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: You can examine and manipulate the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Parameters%2A> collection, and other database query properties prior to running the query by accessing the <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> object exposed by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs.Command%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Można badania i manipulowania <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText%2A>, <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Parameters%2A>kolekcji i inne właściwości zapytania bazy danych przed uruchomieniem kwerendy, uzyskując dostęp do <xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand>Obiekt udostępniany przez <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs.Command%2A>Właściwości.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs.Command%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.Parameters%2A> </xref:System.Data.Common.DbCommand.CommandText%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also examine the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object that is passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> method by accessing the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs.Arguments%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Można również sprawdzić <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>obiekt, który jest przekazywany do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>metody uzyskując dostęp do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs.Arguments%2A>Właściwości.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs.Arguments%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: The SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs class is used in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A> method to provide access to a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> database query before it is run.
trans-unit.target: Klasa SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs jest używana w <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A>metodę w celu zapewnienia dostępu do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>zapytanie bazy danych przed uruchomieniem.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control exposes many events that you can handle to work with the underlying data objects during the course of a data operation.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>Kontroli udostępnia wiele zdarzeń, które może obsłużyć do pracy z obiektów danych w trakcie operacji danych.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the events and associated <xref:System.EventArgs> classes and event handler delegates.
trans-unit.target: W poniższej tabeli wymieniono zdarzenia i skojarzone <xref:System.EventArgs>klasy i delegaci programu obsługi zdarzeń.</xref:System.EventArgs>

trans-unit.source: |Event|EventArgs|EventHandler| |-----------|---------------|------------------| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting>.
trans-unit.target: | Zdarzenia | EventArgs | EventHandler | |-----------|---------------|------------------| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the data is retrieved.|SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting>.
trans-unit.target: Występuje przed pobraniem danych. | SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updating></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserting></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventHandler>

trans-unit.source: Occur before an insert, update, or delete operation is performed.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler>| |<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted>.
trans-unit.target: Wystąpić przed insert, update lub operacja usuwania jest wykonywane. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler>| | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Deleted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Updated></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Inserted></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceCommandEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Occur after the data retrieval, insert, update, or delete operation completes.|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs>|<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventHandler>|
trans-unit.target: Występują po pobierania danych ukończy insert, update lub operacji usuwania. | <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs>| <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventHandler>|</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventHandler></xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceStatusEventArgs>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs"></xref> class, using the specified <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object and any <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*> method.
trans-unit.target: Inicjuje nowe wystąpienie klasy <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs"> </xref> przy użyciu określonego <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"> </xref> obiekt i wszystkie <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> przekazany do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>metody.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>

trans-unit.source: The `inputParameters` parameter is an <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary> collection of name/value pairs that match those in the method signature and are passed by reference.
trans-unit.target: `inputParameters` Parametr jest <xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>zbiór par nazw i wartości, które są zgodne z tymi w podpisie metody i są przekazywane przez odwołanie.</xref:System.Collections.IDictionary>

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"></xref> object that represents the cancelable <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*> query.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Data.Common.DbCommand"> </xref> Obiekt, który reprezentuje można anulować <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>zapytania.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*> method.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> Obiekt przekazywany do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>metody.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object passed to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*> method.
trans-unit.target: Pobiera <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> obiekt przekazywany do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>metody.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select*>

trans-unit.source: You can examine the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> object to determine whether sorting, paging, or a row count are requested as part of the data retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: Można sprawdzić <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>obiektu do ustalenia, czy sortowanie i stronicowanie, lub liczba wierszy są wymagane w ramach operacji pobierania danych.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: Data-bound controls use the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments> class to request that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> perform additional data-related operations on a result set, such as sorting the data or returning a specific subset of data.
trans-unit.target: Formanty powiązane z danymi użycia <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>klasy, aby zażądać <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>wykonać dodatkowe czynności związanych z danymi w zestawie wyników, takich jak sortowania danych lub zwracanie konkretnego podzestawu danych.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: These data-related operations are enumerated by the <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: Te operacje związane z danych są wyliczane przez <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities>wyliczenie.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceCapabilities>

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>.
trans-unit.target: Aby uzyskać więcej informacji zobacz <xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>.</xref:System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object, or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> object is specified during <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs"></xref> creation.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> obiekt, lub <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> Jeśli żadne <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> obiektu jest określana podczas <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceSelectingEventArgs"> </xref> tworzenia.
